sentences.sContent: It was dubbed into Spanish for Mexican audiences.
sentences.sCn: 它已为墨西哥观众配成西班牙语了。

synos.tran: [电影]配音；轻点；打击；授予称号

words.tran: 配音；译制；皮革保护油；爵士的授予
配音；译制；给皮革加脂或上油；双人乘骑；授予爵士封号（dub的ing形式）

trans.tranCn: 配音；轻点；打击；授予称号
trans.tranOther: to change the original spoken language of a film or television programme into another language
